metadata.title: CVE-2015-9383 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
FreeType before 2.6.2 has a heap-based buffer over-read intt_cmap14_validate in sfnt/ttcmap.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-9383` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

freetype2-demos - 2.5.2-1ubuntu2.8+esm1
libfreetype6 - 2.5.2-1ubuntu2.8+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: freetype package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.2-1ubuntu2.8+esm1').
